Author: smackaysmith
Content: She's a superb interviewer. This isn't your 60 Minutes style of interviewer where she's the star and the subject is simply the vehicle to make her look smart, etc. Also, Paul Graham's forward is one of the best essays I've read in a long time. And, perhaps, the best opening paragraph. Damn, the man should be hired just to do that. The sprinter metaphor: genius.

Author: jgamman
Content: i don't know about you but when my local new zealand newspaper  has a "reddit-this" button it heralded a large decline in quality.  i think a smaller, focused community is more use.
